description: My place is close to beautiful Prospect Park and delicious Caribbean food. The subway is half a block away (B and Q lines).. You’ll love my place because of the light and the coziness. No street noise - just the occasional above  ground train. And you'll get a beautiful sunset every night! . My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and furry friends (pets).
name: Light and Airy Uber-Studio near trains and park
